oai_dc:dc.dc:title: United Confederate Veterans uniform
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This uniform belonged to Sgt. John Cloar, Co. A, 33rd Tenn. Inf. Regt., CSA, of Union City, Tenn. It consists of pants and a sack coat, which has simple dome buttons with the letters U.C.V. The suit has a label from Coble & Claggett of Union City, Tenn. The buttons are from Pettibone Manufacturing, Cincinnati.
